CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 12, 1952, pg. 1, reads: "NEW FIRE CAPTAIN - Frank W. Clark was sworn in last week as a captain in city fire department. Present when he took the oath were, left to right, James T. Coslett, fire chief; Director of Public of Public Safety George E. A. Fairley, Mr. Clark, John O'Keefe, Robert E. Williams, Fifth Ward chairman, and David B. Roberts, prothonotary. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Col. George Fairley swearing in fire captain Frank W. Clark, with James T. Coslett on left, John O'Keefe fourth from left, Robert E. "Pappy" Williams, and David B. Roberts
